content: Look, you see what's happening here man? Our team is coming apart because of your singing thing. Even the drama geeks and the brainiacs suddenly think they can... talk to us. Look, the skater dudes are mingling. Suddenly people think that they can do other stuff. Stuff that is not their stuff. They've got you thinking about show tunes when we've got a playoff game next week.
author: Kenny Ortega
